channel.title: Northrop Grumman on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in Northrop Grumman on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Northrop Grumman successfully resupplies ISS after overcoming software glitch
item.description: The premature engine shutdowns were triggered by a conservative software safeguard.

item.title: A record supply load won’t reach the International Space Station as scheduled
item.description: The problem arose early Tuesday when the spacecraft’s main engine shut down earlier than expected.

item.title: Northrop Grumman’s new spacecraft is a real chonker
item.description: “We’re excited that Northrop is ready to deliver this incredibly beneficial increase in capacity.”
